articles.description: The Burnley boss believes that the NHS would feel the benefit if Premier League stars were vaccinated in the immediate future and money used for testing pushed back into the vaccination system
articles.content:

articles.title: Arsenal could pull off £39.9m transfer masterstroke in the January window - Football.London
articles.description: Arsenal are on the lookout for creativity during the January transfer window and there is one player they could land for a cut-price if they are willing to pull the trigger.
articles.content:
